      case 'improve':
        result = await improveText(text, { correctionsOnly, writingStyle, tone })
        break

      case 'alternatives':
        result = await getWordAlternatives(word, context, { mode, sourceLang, targetLang })
        break

      case 'rephrase':
        result = await rephraseText(text)
        break
